tool_description: Analyzes document image quality including resolution, clarity, lighting, and potential tampering indicators.

image_data.description: Base64 encoded image data to analyze

error_messages: Image analysis failed: Unable to analyze the provided image data.
Invalid minimum resolution: Resolution value must be between 72 and 1200 DPI.
usage: Provide document image data and optionally set minimum resolution requirements. The tool analyzes various quality metrics.

lighting_quality.description: Lighting assessment: excellent, good, fair, poor

tampering_detected.description: Whether potential image tampering was detected

overall_quality.description: Overall quality rating: excellent, good, acceptable, poor
